name: Gnomon's Master
text:
—With this, the transfer of authority is complete.
Henceforth, this 'grimoire' is yours.
Handle it well.

The end of training that had continued since he was a child.
He remembered the night his master entrusted him with the 'grimoire'
as if it were yesterday.

That 'grimoire' was the highest-grade 'grimoire',
said to be able to intervene in all the laws of this world,
depending on how it was used.

Only one person in this world could access it.
It was the moment when the lamp, passed down from generation to generation,
was inherited by him.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
This 'grimoire' will surely be the key to saving the world
when the 'Hero' descends upon this dying star.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
When that time comes—
You shall serve the 'Hero' and surely
fufill your mission to save this world.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Yes.
I understand, Master.

name: Gnomon
text:
I was born into this world for that purpose,
and have diligently trained.
I will surely fulfill my role as the 'Great Wizard'.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
Hmm, very good.
...Well, I've conveyed what needs to be conveyed as the 'grimoire' holder.

Immediately after the "ritual" ended.
His master, who had until then exuded an unusually strict aura,
returned to his usual self.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
From here on, I'll tell you words as your uncle,
and not your master... my only blood relative.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
Well... knowing you, who grew up so earnest as the main family's successor,
you'll probably have trouble understanding the words of a profligate son
of a branch family like me.
The rugged old man, chuckling self-deprecatingly, turned a serious, somewhat sorrowful gaze upon me.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
I've passed on the role of 'Great Wizard' to you according to the agreement... but I'm worried about you,
who has lived so obediently to the family.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
Indeed, that 'grimoire' holds great power.
Enough that I understand why strict rules of succession were established
and why it has been protected at the risk of life.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
However, after you finish the urgent task of saving the world,
it will become a useless object.
Except for 'magic' related to the 'rift'—

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
The rest is just 'magic' that anyone in the world will eventually be able to reach.
There's no need for you to be bound by such things for your entire life.

name: Gnomon
text:
...I've heard those words many times.
Shouldn't fulfilling my duty be the top priority?

name: Gnomon
text:
Before achieving the primary objective,
I don't feel the need
to think about what comes after.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
Hehe, I thought you'd answer that way.
Of course... this closed temple
is your entire world.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
But from now on, you will meet many people outside this temple.
When the time comes to fulfill your duty—

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
You will likely embark on a journey to find the 'rift'.
You can think about it thoroughly then.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
Even though I was slandered terribly by my family...
I learned many things by traveling the outside world.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
I even met people I could call "companions"...
And I realized how narrow a world I had lived in.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
I know very well that you are afraid of people from the outside.
But... it's a path you can't avoid.
Besides—

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
It's a shame not to enjoy it anyway.
At least then, I pray that you will meet good "companions".

—At that time, I did not fully understand
the meaning of my master's parting words.
Fulfilling my role as the 'Great Wizard'...

I believed without a doubt that it was my reason for existence.
But my master's dying words at that time
had always remained in my heart—

And now that I'm embarking on this journey,
I'm even seeing them in my dreams.
But...

name: Gnomon
text:
...Can I truly become a 'companion'?
With those people...

name: Gnomon
text:
Even now, I'm afraid of interacting with others...
I'm such a coward.

Chapter 3:
The Winged Messenger

The day after arriving in the "Endangered World".
[Player] and the others set off, with the grand cheers of the people of the royal castle behind them.

The four of them left the royal castle and journeyed across the plains.
The sky, without a Satellite Band, was high and clear, so calm that it showed no signs of impending doom.

options.text: I really have been made a 'Hero'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you just realizing that now...?
Well, what can I say...
Being an 'Observer' is tough.

options.text: I wonder if this journey will go well.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
We have no choice but to make it work, do we?
Otherwise, we'll disappear along with this world.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't you dare blatantly try to escape reality.
Well, what can I say...
Being an 'Observer' is tough.

name: Gnomon
text:
Danzo-sama, what's wrong?
Yesterday at the banquet, you were also tilting your head.

name: Danzo
text:
...Hm? Oh, no!
It's nothing, really, at least it's not related to our journey,
so it's okay to ignore it!

name: Danzo
text:
Well, what happens, happens!
At least I clearly understood
that the food in this world is delicious, right?

name: Danzo
text:
Even if there's a time limit,
it doesn't seem like it's going to happen tomorrow or the day after, right?
Let's do our best not to lose motivation!

name: Hydoor
text:
You're really incomprehensible...
Well, I guess there's a bit of an atmosphere
that makes me think it might work out somehow.

name: Hydoor
text:
One moment he seems incredibly cautious,
the next he's carelessly carefree.
Don't you feel any urgency at all?

name: Danzo
text:
Of course I'm super anxious!
But, it's not a bad thing to deliberately
create a sense of tranquility, you know~?

name: Danzo
text:
Let's think of it as a blessing to have time for small talk like this!
Compared to a job where your head gets chopped off if you let your guard down for even a second,
it's heaven, you know?

name: Gnomon
text:
...What kind of workplace is that?
Is being a hero in your world
such a harsh profession?

options.text: It depends on the time and situation...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, my bad, what was I thinking!
Hmm, I guess ninja jokes were
too dark after all~.

name: Hydoor
text:
...So? Where are we heading now?
We're looking for the location of the 'rift', right?

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes, that's right. It's not something we can find
by just wandering around aimlessly.

name: Gnomon
text:
It would be great if we could at least get a hint...
[Player]-sama.
Can you sense the presence of the 'rift'?

name: Gnomon
text:
More precisely, the spot where the 'rift'
has exposed a part of itself.
If we can find that, it's enough.

options.text: Hmm, I wonder if I can...

text:
[Player] closed their eyes and concentrated.
They tried a different method than yesterday.

name: Exio
text:
...There's another way to detect the presence of paths and monsters.
It's a method of expanding your own consciousness.

name: Exio
text:
Entrust your consciousness to the flow of Ether,
and imagine lifting yourself high into the sky,
holding a wide perspective.

name: Exio
text:
It will probably consume more mental energy than backtracking footprints,
but once you get used to it, I think it's quite convenient.

options.text: Just as I was taught then...
Expanding myself into the world, huh...

text:
The image of sending consciousness upwards,
followed by the image of broadly overseeing the world.
They tried it as they were taught.

In the dark field of vision, a faint light emerged.
It was countless points of eerie colors—

And far in the distance, a vividly colored surface.
However, both the distance and direction were ambiguous.

name: Gnomon
text:
—How is it?
Can you observe it?

options.text: I can't grasp the direction or distance...

name: Gnomon
text:
I see... So even for Hero-sama, it's quite difficult to observe.
—Please wait.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Index, search.
"Observation", "Directionality".

As Gnomon muttered, a translucent window appeared before his eyes,
and text information flowed like a waterfall.

name: Gnomon
text:
—This seems usable.
[Player]-sama, could you lower your head slightly?

[Player] bent slightly in front of Gnomon.
He inserted a coin into his staff and held the staff over their head.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Cost 5.
Observation direction correction, 60 seconds.
Target, Ether pump.

Above their head, his staff glowed for a moment.
Then, as Gnomon lowered his staff,
[Player] raised their head.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Thank you.
It's my first time using it, but...
Please try observing once more.

As prompted, [Player] tried to observe the 'rift' once more.
Then—

—More clearly than before.
They could now grasp the form of the wide-open path.

Although it was a sensory-level perception that was difficult to quantify...
They could faintly grasp its direction and distance.

options.text: Oh, the way it looks has changed!
I can see it, I can see it...!

name: Gnomon
text:
...Good, it seems to be effective.
How did the 'rift' appear to you?
Did you understand its location?

options.text: I saw it more clearly than before.
I can't pinpoint the exact location, though.

text:
Based on the results of their observation,
[Player] pointed in the direction where they saw the 'rift'.

name: Gnomon
text:
Hmm, it seems that the 'magic' isn't strong enough to pinpoint the coordinates...
But, thank you, Hero-sama.

name: Gnomon
text:
With this, we know the direction we should head.
Let's proceed by repeating this method as needed.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hah!? Wh-What was that just now?
What did you do to [Player]!?
You were talking about 60 seconds or something...!

name: Gnomon
text:
To explain simply, I used magic that makes it easier for an 'Observer' to observe a target.
Actually, around the 'rift'—

name: Gnomon
text:
There exists an enormous number of nanomachine, covering the 'rift'.
But, conversely, by using those nanomachine...

name: Gnomon
text:
I made it possible to prioritize observing the existence of the nanomachine.
However, it has a heavy cost, so it cannot be used frequently.

name: Hydoor
text:
...........
Was that supposed to be a simple explanation?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...boss, are you alright?
Are you really keeping up with the conversation?

options.text: Is it like a fish finder?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, so that's what it is.
Thanks for the easy-to-understand analogy,
[Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...boss, are you alright?
Are you really keeping up with the conversation?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Now that we know the direction we should aim for.
Shall we stop by a town and prepare food and other supplies?

name: Gnomon
text:
I believe in that direction there's...
—Navigator, activate.

As Gnomon swung his staff again,
a large window appeared before [Player] and the others.

On what was clearly a map screen,
a straight red line extended, and a pin was placed
at what seemed to be a city along that line.

name: Gnomon
text:
There's a town exactly in the direction we're heading.
Let's make this our supply point.

name: Danzo
text:
...Hey. What exactly is 'magic' anyway?
It seems to have a bit of a scientific technology taste to it, doesn't it?

name: Danzo
text:
For example, a navigation system like this
existed in our era too.

options.text: It feels like fantasy but not.

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes, as you say. Our 'magic' is the scientific technology
of a civilization that has already perished...
You can think of it that way without issue.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's the technology of a civilization so advanced that history records it as the ultimate culmination of science.
We don't even know its full scope...

name: Gnomon
text:
However, some of the technical information from that era remains as relics,
and we refer to them as 'magic' and use them.

name: Gnomon
text:
It is, in a sense, inevitable that technologies familiar to you
are included in 'magic'.

name: Danzo
text:
Haa~... so it's the kind of thing where advanced technology
is indistinguishable from magic, huh?
I thought that was just an exaggeration.

name: Hydoor
text:
...No, I mean. If you can use such amazing things,
can't you just get whatever you need with 'magic'?

name: Hydoor
text: Yesterday at the banquet, you brought all the food and everything else with 'magic', didn't you?

name: Gnomon
text:
That was possible yesterday because preparations were already made.
In short, we just transported the prepared dishes and such.

name: Gnomon
text:
It is, as expected, impossible to create something from nothing with 'magic',
or to remotely buy things and have them delivered instantly.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hmm... Since it's called 'magic' with such a grand name,
I was imagining something out of a fairy tale, but—

name: Hydoor
text:
It's not that big a deal after all.
It feels like it's just our era's technology with a bit of a twist.

name: Gnomon
text:
...It is as you say.
Then, shall I let you experience a technology
that you have probably never experienced before?

Gnomon's brow twitched at Hydoor's innocent remark.
Then he straddled his staff.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Everyone.
Please follow behind me.
Straddle the staff as I do.

options.text: What are you planning to do...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wh-What is it!?
I just said what I thought, you know!?

text:
[Player] behind Gnomon, followed by Danzo and Hydoor.
Everyone straddled the long staff and gripped it.

Gnomon confirmed this, then took out a handful of jingling coins from his robe
and inserted them one after another.

Then, the staff began to glow,
and a sound like grinding machinery began to emanate from it.

From the very end of the staff, a flame-like energy
resembling the bristles of a broom
began to gush out.

name: Hydoor
text:
Whoa whoa whoa! What is it!?
My tail, my tail is burning!!

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, what's this!?
Is it starting, like, a super extravagant, luxurious attraction!?

name: Gnomon
text:
—Destination confirmed.
Posture control, on.
...Flight.

Simultaneously with Gnomon's declaration,
the staff, carrying all four of them, ascended vertically
at high speed.

name: Gnomon
text:
—As long as you don't let go of the staff, you will absolutely not fall, so don't worry.
Now... accelerate.

As Gnomon gave the next command,
the "broom" began to move forward in the air
with a sudden acceleration.

name: Hydoor
text:
Whooaaahhh!!!?
S-So high! So fast!
H-Help meee!!

name: Danzo
text:
Phew—!!
I don't feel the wind, but it's such a thrill!!
AWESOME—!!!

A screaming Hydoor,
a MAX-tension Danzo,
carrying [Player] and Gnomon—

The "broom" flew at an astonishing speed
towards the direction of the town.

Arriving above the town in an instant,
they descended vertically
and landed slowly.

The group disembarked onto
the plaza of an unfamiliar town.

options.text: Oh, we arrived in an instant.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, my apologies.
Were you uncomfortable with heights?
I will keep that in mind from now on.

options.text: It was more comfortable than I thought.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I was perfectly controlling posture and inertial forces.
I'm glad if you were satisfied.

name: Danzo
text:
Ehh~, is the sky drive over already?
Wow, that was really great...
The 'magic' of the future, it's really good!

name: Hydoor
text:
—Hey, you!!
If you're going to fly,
say so beforehand!!

name: Hydoor
text:
And if something's going to blow out from the back,
say that too!!

name: Gnomon
text:
...Ah, I was careless.
My apologies. I didn't think Hydoor-sama
would be so afraid of the sky.

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah!? N-Nothing to be afraid of in the sky, you know!?
I was just worried my tail would get scorched!!

name: Gnomon
text:
That energy doesn't have the property of burning things, you know.
You'd know if you touched it.

name: Hydoor
text:
Ugh...!?
Th-That's... but still!!

name: Gnomon
text:
Perhaps... you were intimidated even after confirming it?
Your courage doesn't seem to be that great.

name: Hydoor
text_after: What's wrong with this kid, hey!!

options.text: What should I do about this situation?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey! That's enough, you two.
We can't just fight here
and disband the party, can we?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey! That's enough, you two.
We can't just fight here
and disband the party, can we?

name: Gnomon
text:
...My apologies,
[Player]-sama, Danzo-sama.
I was a little out of composure.

name: Gnomon
text:
Let's procure supplies in this town.
I'll guide you, so
would you please assist me?

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, wait up!!
Are you not going to apologize to me, you bastard!!
Do you want to be made to cry!?

Hydoor yelled, chasing after Gnomon,
who had temporarily put aside his staff, apologized, and walked away.

options.text: Both of them are equally at fault...
Gnomon-kun has quite a foul mouth...

name: Danzo
text:
Oh dear...
Those two are pretty much on the same level, aren't they?

name: Danzo
text:
Come on, let's follow them, boss!
Being alone in an unfamiliar town
is seriously too scary!

options.text: Oh, a nice smell of food.

name: Danzo
text:
Yeah, yeah, I quite like walking around unfamiliar towns, you know?
Just walking around...

They had started walking together,
but before they knew it, Danzo had stopped,
looking suspicious.

name: Danzo
text:
...Eh?
Oh, right. Let's go.
...........

name: Danzo
text:
(...Still weird, though.
Yesterday's banquet, and this town...)

name: Food Store Owner
text:
Welcome... Oh!
Hero-sama, thank you for stopping by!

name: Food Store Owner
text:
I know it's a difficult task, but
please don't overexert yourself.
Do your best.

name: Food Store Owner
text:
You're looking for preserved food, right?
Then, how about this... Eh?
"Nessen", who is that...?

name: Magic Tool Shop Owner
text:
Oh, Great Wizard and Hero-sama!
I've heard rumors of your journey,
are you here for spare parts for your staff?

name: Magic Tool Shop Owner
text:
Hehe, I thought you might stop by,
so I prepared thoroughly!
Take as much as you need!

name: Magic Tool Shop Owner
text:
Well, no matter what the outcome of your journey is,
no one will complain.
Take it easy.

name: Magic Tool Shop Owner
text:
...Wh-What is it, Hero-sama?
Is there something on my face?
Haa... Hisaki...?

name: Security Guard
text:
Oh, Hero-sama!
Good work on your duties!
Are you looking for something?

name: Security Guard
text:
Ah, if you're looking for a 'magic' material store,
it's around that corner, three blocks down
in the market!

name: Security Guard
text:
I believe it will be a difficult journey,
but please be careful!
Everyone will be on your side until the very end, no matter the outcome!

name: Security Guard
text:
—Hero-sama? You're making me blush when you stare like that.
Am I really that charming? Hehe...

name: Cafeteria Worker
text:
—Is that all your order?
We'll collect the tickets here.
Please enjoy your meal.

After finishing their shopping, the group
entered a bustling cafeteria filled with customers,
and decided to have lunch.

name: Gnomon
text:
...What's wrong?
Ever since a moment ago, you've been tilting your head
every time you talk to the people in town.

options.text: Everyone just looks so familiar, like I've seen them somewhere...
They all look like the people I saw on Earth.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Earth... is that the name of a planet?
I haven't heard of it, but—

options.text: They look similar, but they're different people, though.

name: Gnomon
text:
Ah, that's why you were calling out names...
People from perished planets also gather here.

name: Gnomon
text:
So, there might be people who look like others, just by coincidence.
That's just a speculation, though.

name: Danzo
text:
What's wrong, Hy-kun?
Are you still sulking?
Why don't you forgive them for being playful?

name: Hydoor
text:
No, it's not that.
...Though it's true I don't like
that kid over there.

name: Hydoor
text:
These people in this town. Every single one of them has a gloomy face.
They seem to be cheering us on,
but they talk as if they don't expect anything.

name: Hydoor
text:
That's what I dislike even more.
Do you mean you can't trust
[Player] and us that much?

name: Gnomon
text:
...I don't think everyone doesn't believe
that Hero-sama will save the world.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's just that you arrived after they had already accepted
that their end would come.

name: Gnomon
text:
They're just thinking that if they aren't saved, then that's that.
...Probably.

options.text: So that's why no one prays for success.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Hmph.
I dislike it even more now.

name: Gnomon
text:
Destruction that they can do nothing about is approaching.
I think it's inevitable that such an atmosphere would prevail.

name: Hydoor
text:
...It's going to be destroyed, yes?
It's going to disappear, yes?
Then why aren't they all clinging to hope?

name: Hydoor
text:
No matter how hopeless it is, no matter how foolish it seems.
There should be someone who keeps struggling until the very end.

name: Hydoor
text:
...I can't understand the way of thinking of people
who accept their end "because it's fate".

With an expression not of anger or dissatisfaction,
but of a certain melancholy,
Hydoor lowered his gaze.

name: Gnomon
text:
...........
Hydoor-sama...?

name: Danzo
text:
—Speaking of which.
Could I share something I've been feeling
since I came to this world?

name: Danzo
text:
No, I've been bothered by it since yesterday's banquet.
And looking around this town,
I realized it's really strange.

name: Danzo
text:
...This world.
We don't hear any music, do we?

name: Danzo
text:
—That's right. It's the same as yesterday's banquet,
and even in this bustling cafeteria, not a single song can be heard.

name: Danzo
text:
Even when I was walking around town, I never heard music from eaves,
and I couldn't even find a shop that dealt with musical instruments.

name: Danzo
text:
I thought this was strange...
Maybe it's just because I'm a musician
that I'm overly concerned about it.

name: Gnomon
text:
"Music", "Song", "Instrument"...
I don't quite grasp what they are, but
the words themselves seem familiar from somewhere...

Saying that, Gnomon called upon his staff,
opened the "grimoire" screen, and began to search.

name: Danzo
text:
Come on... No way.
It's a culture that humans have had since they were animals, you know?
There's no way it would easily die out...

name: Gnomon
text:
—Unfortunately, it seems that's precisely the case.
It would be more accurate to say that it has declined to the point of being a culture
that only remains in extremely localized areas.

Gnomon dispassionately summarized and explained the information
recorded in the "grimoire" as he read through it.

name: Gnomon
text:
6000 years ago, when civilization across the universe collapsed.
There was a great uproar that the universe would disappear if things continued like this,
and all forms of entertainment were self-regulated.

name: Gnomon
text:
The people who were left must have been desperate.
Some forms of entertainment were revived during the process of civilization's reconstruction, but...

name: Gnomon
text:
Some were lost, having remained self-regulated as "inappropriate for the times",
and generally were not revived.

name: Gnomon
text:
However, in very limited areas, small traces of folk
"songs" and "dances" still remain, or so I'm told.

options.text: No wonder we couldn't hear any.

name: Danzo
text:
...........
Seriously, no way...

Danzo, usually talkative and composed,
was unusually speechless and showed signs of distress.
—Just then.

Whooaaahh!!
Help meee!!

A scream from outside the cafeteria.
Then, people poured in from the entrance.
Disturbance spread inside the cafeteria as well.

name: Hydoor
text:
—! What is it!?
Hey, what happened outside!?

name: Townsperson
text:
M-Monsters!
Monsters have appeared on the main street...!

name: Danzo
text:
Hey, hey, what terrible timing!
I just found out a super shocking truth, you know!

name: Gnomon
text:
...As I mentioned briefly yesterday, there aren't many heroes in this world.
In a town of this size, it's common for there to be none.

name: Gnomon
text:
Let's go and deal with it.
Before everything is trampled.

options.text: I'm still in the middle of my meal!!

name: Monster
text:
Guuuuuugh!!
Gyaaaaoon!!

Going against the flow of people, they proceeded down the main street.
Ahead, there were indeed a considerable number of young monsters.
They roared, seemingly still unsatisfied, and rampaged indiscriminately in search of humans.

name: Gnomon
text:
...The situation is worse than I thought.
It's going to be a pain to crush them all.

name: Danzo
text:
Oh dear, they seem to have already eaten a fair number of people, huh?
We have to defeat them quickly and rescue them!

name: Hydoor
text:
From what I can see, the only saving grace is that they're all small fry...!
Alright, [Player]!

name: Mobile Device
text:
—Would you like to connect to the 'path'?
To begin operation, please tap "OK".

note: (I know they created a fancy animation and all but I'm not including that)

text:
[Player] proceeded to transform Danzo,
Hydoor, and Gnomon one after another.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Thank you, Hero-sama.
I shall repay your gratitude with my work.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hmph, quite confident, aren't you!
It'll be interesting to see how much you, who easily yielded to us yesterday,
can do.

name: Gnomon
text:
...You too. Don't be so foolish as to charge in alone,
get cornered, and make a pathetic face like you did earlier.

name: Hydoor
text:
You bastard...!
Alright, I'll make it clear
which one of us is superior!

name: Danzo
text:
Ah, they're still at it!
We're fighting together, so let's work in sync, okay!?
If you don't, I'll personally discipline you!?

options.text: I wonder if this party will be okay...?

text: Battle Start

name: Monsters
text:
Gigegge!!
Pipii!!

name: Gnomon
text:
—Cost 3, rapid fire.
Rapid fire, rapid fire, rapid fire!

Gnomon inserted coins into his staff
and immediately fired a barrage of fireballs
at the monsters.

The fireballs accurately hit the monsters.
However...

name: Purple Slime-type Monster
text:
Gigagagaga!!
Kyaooooon!!

Perhaps because he was used to fighting at a distance,
when monsters suddenly got close,
his reaction became sluggish.

name: Gnomon
text:
—!
Darn it...!

name: Hydoor
text:
—Oraaahhh!!
Take this!!

—Into that wide-open gap,
Hydoor leapt in, delivering a sharp punch,
followed by a roundhouse kick.
He sent the monster flying.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Ah.
Thank you...

name: Hydoor
text:
—No thanks needed!
You, when they get close, you freeze up entirely, so fix that!

name: Hydoor
text:
Alright monsters, come into my ocean!!
"Swift Swim", Okeanós tou Drákos!!

Hydoor fired an anchor at the monster horde.
The area around the rope instantly expanded into a pool of water.
But...

name: Monsters
text:
Piggi, giggi!!
Gigagahhh!!

name: Hydoor
text:
—!? Tch!!
As expected, against monsters,
even if I drop them into the ocean, it's...

name: Gnomon
text:
...Hydoor-sama, please step back.
—Cost 2, lightning strike.
Domain expansion.

Gnomon swung his staff with his declaration.
Several golden glowing spheres appeared in the air
and began to discharge electricity.

name: Gnomon
text:
—The rope,
please let go of it!

name: Hydoor
text:
Eh!?
Alright!!

Hydoor detached the rope from his Parallel Weapon.
The "sea" began to shrink, but...

name: Gnomon
text:
—Charging complete!
Fire!

name: Monsters
text:
Bugagagagagaga!!
Kagieeeh!!

The released electric shock propagated through the entire monster group
that had been dropped into the "sea".
It dealt damage to all of them, causing them to disappear.

name: Hydoor
text:
Th-That's amazing...
—! Next!
What about the other monsters!?

name: Monster
text:
Gigah!?
Gyoeh...

name: Danzo
text:
—Alright, that's done.
This seems to be the last one.
[Player]-kun, how is it?

Danzo grabbed the last monster,
stabbed it with a kunai, and made it disappear.

options.text: The presence of monsters... seems to be gone!

name: Hydoor
text:
I-Is it over...?
Haa, what was that...
It took a lot of effort because there were so many of them.

Perhaps the tension had broken,
Hydoor lowered his guard and let out a deep sigh.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Um, Hydoor-sama.
Thank you for earlier.
And—well.

name: Gnomon
text:
I take back my words about you being "nothing special"...
Being able to enter that range requires guts... I think.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Hmph. Watch your tongue.
And... well.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Um, I'm sorry.
For saying all those bad things.
You're quite something, your 'magic' too.

Avoiding each other's gaze, seemingly finding it difficult to speak,
Gnomon and Hydoor exchanged words.

name: Danzo
text:
Haa~?
What is this, "after the rain, the ground hardens"?
You two are so not honest to each other.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh!? Who became friends with who, huh!!
It's not like that, besides,
stop that lukewarm gaze!!

options.text: Let's acknowledge each other as companions.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You bastard...!
Are you messing with me!?
It's not like that!!

name: Danzo
text:
Well, this is another issue resolved!
This is truly a win-win situation, isn't it!
Alright, there's still food left, so...

Just as Danzo was about to suggest returning to the cafeteria,
the people who had been watching from a distance began to swarm towards Danzo.

name: Townsperson
text:
U-Um...!
Hero-san!
What was that just now!?

name: Danzo
text:
Huh...?
Which one was just now?
I did too many things...

name: Townsperson
text:
That one!
The one where you rubbed something like a disc and made a lot of sounds!

name: Danzo
text:
—Now, show me your dance!
'Ninja Art' Floor Killing Player!
Yeeaahhh!!!

name: Danzo
text:
—Oh, right!
My special move!?
Did you... perhaps like it?

name: Townsperson
text:
Oh, absolutely!!
I never knew so many sounds layering together could create such
pleasant music!!

name: Townsperson
text:
I want to hear more of that!
What kind of 'magic' is that!?
My heart felt like it was trembling!

Everyone seemed deeply impressed by the music Danzo played.
But not a single person mentioned the word "music".

They truly seemed to not know the true nature of "it"—
which created a melody that made their hearts tremble
by layering multiple sounds.

name: Danzo
text:
...I see, I see!
That, you know, is a secret 'magic'
passed down through a single lineage!?

name: Danzo
text:
I'll play a lot more for you from now on,
so make sure to check out our battles!

At Danzo's words,
the audience erupted in shouts of joy.

options.text: You're just making things up again...
You should stop making up so many excuses.

name: Danzo
text:
Haha, sorry, sorry!
My old bad habit of talking impulsively
came out!

While acting playfully,
Danzo was thinking.

name: Danzo
text:
...Well now.
What should I do...?

—Meanwhile.
In some town in the "Endangered World".
A place like a blacksmith's shop.

name: Blacksmith Colleague
text:
...Oh, what's wrong?
Ah, you were watching the Heroes' battle, huh.

name: Blacksmith Colleague
text:
That's unusual, for you to be so engrossed
in something like this.

No... I just thought they were handling some really interesting stuff.
I ended up getting too interested.

That... is it music?
It's been a long time since I heard it.

Hmm... But this anchor user.
It looks like they're struggling with their weapon, too.

name: Blacksmith Colleague
text:
Are you that interested in the Heroes?
Then, why don't you go meet them directly?

name: Blacksmith Colleague
text:
I heard from a merchant in that town, through the network.
Apparently, the Heroes are supposed to pass through this town tomorrow.

Ohh!
That's perfect, isn't it!!

The craftsman let out a joyful cry and stood up.
Her face was illuminated by the sunlight
streaming in from outside.

...Well then.
While I'm at it, I'll try to sell some weapons,
and go see various things.
